text: geneina, sudan -- five hundred sudanese militiamen in government service disarmed yesterday at a ceremony attended by un envoy jan pronk, but denied they were arab janjaweed irregulars who killed, raped, and looted in darfur.
headline: Hundreds of militia disarm in Sudan

text: the extent of red sox ace curt schilling's ankle injury virtually guarantees that he will not be in top form until surgeons repair his damaged right ankle after the season, according to medical experts.
headline: Experts: Surgery only effective option

text: new york (reuters) - new york attorney general eliot   spitzer, who is probing bid-rigging in the insurance industry,   expects to file suit against insurance consultant universal   life resources as early as friday, a spokesman for his office   said.
headline: Spitzer Expects to Sue Universal Life
